name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender strips of marinated steak served on a sizzling hot skillet with onions and bell peppers. Accompanied by warm flour tortillas, guacamole, sour cream, and salsa.

name: Crispy Chicken
description: Juicy chicken wings fried to perfection, tossed in a sticky honey garlic sauce, and garnished with sesame seeds and chopped green onions.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Al dente spaghetti pasta tossed with crispy pancetta, creamy egg and Parmesan cheese sauce, finished with cracked black pepper and fresh parsley.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and scrambled eggs, seasoned with a tangy tamarind sauce and garnished with lime wedges and cilantro.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet marinated in lemon, garlic, and herbs, grilled to perfection, and served with a side of roasted vegetables and couscous.

name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and special sauce, served on a toasted brioche bun with a side of crispy fries.
